name: LISA: The Ventful
description:
• Amogus
  • 4 maps, with 2 explorable.
  • A world rich in susness.

Disclaimer:

  • This is my first ever RPGmaker project. Quality will be RUBBISH.
  • I have no idea what I've done right or wrong.
  • I kinda just winged it to be fair.

I hope you all enjoy!

Feel free to invoke criticism. But actually play the game before blasting me for even uttering the word "amogus"
